allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update booking system and UI improvements

- Migrate booking system from Airtable to n8n webhook
- Add error boundary for better error handling
- Improve mobile responsiveness and layout
- Add coming soon page placeholder
- Update structured data and SEO optimization
- Add scroll utilities and UI enhancements

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Set coming soon page as homepage

- Move main site to /main-site route
- Set coming soon page as homepage (/)
- Keep full site available at /main-site for future launch

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "Replace ''medizinischer Behandlung'' with neutral wording")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Revert to blue color scheme and fix navigation

- Reverted primary color from purple to blue (#2563eb)
- Reverted accent color to cyan (#0891b2)
- Kept all animations (fade-in, slide-up, float, glow)
- Verified navigation menu IDs match component sections
- Cleaned .next cache and restarted dev server
- Removed old documentation files
- Added 404 page, coming soon page
- Updated form validation (only Vorname and Telefon required)
- Updated legal pages (Impressum/Datenschutz) with Elena Schneider details
- Fixed SEO (robots.txt, sitemap.xml)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Merge production readiness updates

- Update Next.js to v15.5.6
- Keep Vercel Speed Insights
- Improve SEO metadata with template support
- Add Kleinunternehmer tax status to Impressum
- Add health office contact details
- Update validation to make email optional
- Update sitemap dates to 2025-11-09
- Add www subdomain to sitemap

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
